resources.string: THAT WAS A MISTAKE. ANSWER CAREFULLY!!!
Sachin Tendulkar\'s 100th century was against England.
Gautam Gambhir is the man of the match in 2007 Twenty-Twenty world cup final.
MS Dhoni was the man who gave the final blow for India in winning 2011 ODI world cup
The nickname of Virat Kohli is \"Chiku\"

Usman Khawaja has involved famous ball tampering issue that occured in 2018
